title: Looking for a t206 Drum HOF
author: Mikehealer

posts.post_title: Looking for a t206 Drum HOF
posts.post_content:
I know it may be a long shot, but wondering if anyone might have a t206 HOFer with a Drum back for sale or trade. I have a few HOFers with tougher backs for trade including Uzit. Here is a link to cards available, some will be tougher for me to trade than others. That said, not one is off limits for the right trade. [url]http://imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206[/url]
Cards in both albums available.

Thanks
Mike

[url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]
Added a link to cards for possible trade.
